MPlayer will give me the best video play: how should I configure MPlayer for best video playback quality?

Right click GUI of MPlayer >Preferrences>Video you will see a list of available drivers just clicking or selecting any enables the driver, select each one by one and see if your video plays, that is how I got mine to work.
